author: Elizabeth Lopatto
title: Here’s how hospitals are keeping up emergency services during COVID-19
description: People aren’t going to stop having heart attacks while the COVID-19 outbreak happens. So hospitals are reworking staffing and other resources to make sure everyone can get care. In some hospitals, even patients who come in for other reasons are also checked f…
content: In the midst of the outbreak, people will still have heart attacks and strokes. Babies will still be born. Appendixes will still burst. And so hospitals are figuring out how to juggle the patients who require ordinary urgent care with those who are sick from … [+6580 chars]
